game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient city of Eldarath and uncover its secrets.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep in the heart of the mystical forest, filled with ancient artifacts and treasures. Many have attempted to find it before, but none have returned.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to elemental attacks

task.objective: Gather information about Eldarath from the local villagers.
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather as much information as possible about the lost city. Look for any clues or hints that might lead you in the right direction.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the mystical forest.
task.description: Make your way through the rolling hills and dense forests until you reach the edge of the mystical forest. Be careful, as the forest is said to be treacherous.

task.objective: Navigate through the mystical forest and find the lost city of Eldarath.
task.description: Use your wits and any information you've gathered to navigate through the treacherous forest. Keep an eye out for landmarks, ancient ruins, or any other clues that might lead you to the lost city.
